description: A visually engaging, futuristic UI design system for presenting documentation and security information. The style is defined by a dark, symmetrical layout, intricate neon frames, and distinct content cards that use glowing purple and cyan accents.

primary.name: primary-background
primary.description: Deep navy/purple, used for the main background.

accent-glow-primary.name: vibrant-purple-glow
accent-glow-primary.description: A bright, glowing purple used for the left card's border and accents.

accent-glow-secondary.name: bright-cyan-glow
accent-glow-secondary.description: A vivid cyan used for the right card's border and highlighted text in the header.

text-primary.name: primary-text
text-primary.description: White for main headings and card titles.

text-secondary.name: secondary-text
text-secondary.description: Light grey for subtitles and body text.

icon-success.name: checkmark-green
icon-success.description: A bright green for the checkmark icons in the list.

typography.fontFamily: Sans-Serif, a modern, geometric font like 'Poppins', 'Montserrat', or 'Exo 2'

layout.structure: A centered, symmetrical two-column layout flanked by a decorative frame.

page-frame.name: outer-decorative-frame
page-frame.description: The complex, multi-layered glowing frame on the left and right edges of the page.

header-section.name: main-header
header-section.description: The top section containing the page title and subtitles.

content-grid.name: dual-card-container
content-grid.description: The container that holds the two main info cards in a grid.

info-card.name: primary-info-card
info-card.description: The main content card for displaying information like 'Whitepaper' or 'Security Audit'.

notched-corners.name: card-corner-cutout
notched-corners.description: The inverted or 'notched' style of the card's corners.

card-icon-container.name: card-header-icon-box
card-icon-container.description: The container at the top of the card that holds a representative icon or image.

checklist.name: feature-list
checklist.description: A list of features or points, each preceded by a checkmark.

checklist-item.name: feature-list-item
checklist-item.description: A single item within the checklist.

partner-logos.name: auditor-logo-display
partner-logos.description: Container for displaying logos of partners or auditors.

cta-button.name: card-action-button
cta-button.description: The primary call-to-action button within a card.

button-icon.name: external-link-icon
button-icon.description: Small icon inside the button to indicate an external link.

central-mascot.name: center-stage-character
central-mascot.description: The character illustration positioned between the two info cards.
